ckanext.rems.convert module¶

Utility functions for converting metadata values to formats accepted by the REMS server.

ckanext.rems.convert.convert_language_code(lang_code)[source]¶

Convert three-letter ISO 639-2 T language codes to two-letter codes if necessary.

ckanext.rems.rems_client module¶

Methods for communicating with the Resource Entitlement Management System

exception ckanext.rems.rems_client.RemsException[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

ckanext.rems.rems_client.generate_license_metadata(licenses, owner_email, resource_domain=None)[source]¶

Generates a REMS-compatible metadata structure for a list of licenses ready for importing to REMS. The result is a nested structure of dicts and lists that can be readily converted to JSON.

Arguments: licenses – a sequence of License objects owner_email – the email address to be defined as the owner of the licenses in REMS resource_domain – the REMS resource domain for the licenses; if None, use the default set in Pylons configuration

ckanext.rems.rems_client.generate_package_metadata(titles, id, owner_emails, license_id, url=None)[source]¶

Generates a REMS-compatible metadata structure from the given package metadata. The result is a nested structure of dicts and lists that can be readily converted to JSON.

Arguments: titles – list of {‘lang’: ‘val’, ‘title’: ‘val’) dicts id – id of the resource/dataset owner_emails – list of Haka-federated email addresses that identify the owners of the dataset license – reference of the license used for the dataset url – (optional) a URL from which the dataset can be obtained

ckanext.rems.rems_client.get_access_application_url(resource_id, target='application')[source]¶

Generates the entry point URL for access application workflow.

ckanext.rems.rems_client.post_metadata(url, metadata, post_format='application/json')[source]¶

Post catalog item (metadata of a dataset) or a license reference to REMS.

DEV: Email for ‘ktester’ account is 'kata.tester@funet.fi‘

Parameters:
  • url (str) – REMS endpoint URL
  • metadata (str) – the metadata of a dataset in the JSON or XML format specified by REMS
  • post_format (str) – MIME type for the posted data
Returns:

None
Raises RemsException:
 

if a connection error occurs or the request returns a non-OK status

ckanext.rems.rems_command module¶

class ckanext.rems.rems_command.RemsCommand(name)[source]¶

Bases: ckan.lib.cli.CkanCommand

Usage: remscmd <command> <owner_email> [server_url]

Allowed commands:

add_ckan_licenses - posts the CKAN license list to REMS

In all cases, <owner_email> should be a Haka-registered email address for the owner of the license or dataset.

If server_url is not specified, rems.rest_base_url from config will be used.

command()[source]¶
summary = ''¶
usage = '\n Usage: remscmd <command> <owner_email> [server_url]\n\n Allowed commands:\n\n add_ckan_licenses \t- posts the CKAN license list to REMS\n\n In all cases, <owner_email> should be a Haka-registered email\n address for the owner of the license or dataset.\n\n If server_url is not specified, rems.rest_base_url from config\n will be used.\n '¶
